text.__SUMMARY__: Agave geminiflora is a species of Agave endemic to the Mexican State of Nayarit. Common name is twin flowered agave.Agave geminiflora can have 100-200 leaves which are linear, stiff, dark green, and have convex edges with white horny lines and curled threads. The flowers are 5 or 6 centimeters long on a tall inflorescence.
